traits.name: Keen Sight
traits.description: The hippogriff has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The hippogriff makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

actions.name: Beak
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.
